p: Fresh leaves of H. arborescens were obtained in the month of June, 2019 from an area located on latitude 32° 47′ 50.4″ S, 26° 52′ 41.8″ E along Hogsback road, Alice Town, Eastern Cape, South Africa. The plant was authenticated by a taxonomist at the University of Fort Hare and a voucher specimen was preserved in the Giffen Herbarium and assigned number Abif2019/03.
